entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Delta
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Windy. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 29. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
